  • Welcome to Phoenix Business Consulting
    Known for transparency of value delivery, anchored on tight adoption of leading procedures
    and trusted partner relationship
    Find Out More
  • Welcome to Phoenix Business Consulting
    Helping Public Sector and Commercial Businesses for over 20 years in their journey towards smart automation of core business operations and intelligent analytics
    TALK TO US

Consulting

SAP IMPLEMENTATION and UPGRADE

Whether your business needs a full -scale SAP ERP, a single module, or an upgrade Phoenix is ready to exceed all expectations

SYSTEM REVIEW AND AUDIT SERVICES

Phoenix has a true passion for advancing Best and Leading Business Practices. We know how to properly implement an SAP system and can validate if you are getting the most out of your SAP system

SAP APPLICATION MANAGEMENT SUPPORT

We understand that every organization has unique support requirements. We offer custom solution that will fit your needs.

SAP TRAINING

Phoenix was founded by SAP Training professionals. We understand having a comprehensive approach to staff training is essential.

SAP STAFF AUGMENTATION

Providing the highest caliber talent is our hallmark

SAP CLOUD MIGRATION and HOSTING

Running cloud based servers  is gaining adoption due to lower costs and easier management. We offer various cloud deployment options.

Markets

State and Local Government

View

K-12 / School Districts

View

Utilities and Special Districts

View

Small and Medium Business

View

Enterprise Business

View

Products

SAP Business By Design

Phoenix also offers SAP Business By Design (ByD). SAP ByD is a cloud-based, SaaS ERP Solution that knits every facet and function of your organization together — delivering functionality for more than 35 time-tested, proven business processes as well as in-depth analytics that show what’s happening in your organization now and what you should do next. And because SAP Business By Design is all-ready, right out of the box, you can get going quickly.

SAP S/4 HANA

SAP’s S/4 HANA offers a seamless, fully integrated ERP solution that offers the most functionality of any ERP platform in the marketplace and represents the first 4th generation ERP solution in the 21st Century. Its revolutionary in-memory database allows both transactional processing and analytics on the same system; radically simplifying the code base, providing staggering increases in performance, and producing real time information across the enterprise.

University of Nebraska
Loren Blinde, Administrative Systems Group

“…Phoenix provided critical design assistance and go-live support. This was at a time our project was at risk. Phoenix served to focus our efforts and provided expertise that was essential to our successful project.  We have consistently found Hanif and his staff to have excellent SAP expertise and are able to provide this in a… read more

University of Kentucky
J. David Hardison, Director- Enterprise Applications Group

I have worked with Hanif Sarangi and the consultants of Phoenix Business Consulting through our implementation and during the ongoing support and maintenance. I was pleased with their performance on the project and their ability to successfully deliver activities on time and budget. To my knowledge, we had no issues with either the firm or… read more

Miami Dade County Public Schools
Debbie Karcher, Chief Information Officer

MDCPS’s SAP Finance implementation had a high level of acceptance amongst the employees of the school district. Phoenix was instrumental in delivering a very successful go-live, which was delivered on-time and on a budget without significant disruption to the operations of the District. [Phoenix] provided the right advice and methodology on how to implement SAP… read more

Los Angeles Community College District
Jeanette Gordon, Chief Financial Officer

I have been pleased with the work performed by Hanif Sarangi and the staff of Phoenix Business Consulting and would recommend their services. His expertise and services were excellent. After a successful go-live of SAP/Financial, we retained Hanif and his Phoenix Business Consulting firm to support the transition and to continue to work for the… read more

Large K-12 School District
T.L., ERP Director

 “Thank you…..thank you.  Well, you did it!  Your delightful group of individuals managed to implement SAP Finance and SRM Procurement.  You should feel exceedingly proud of yourselves; I know I am of all of you!  Your commitment to each other, to the District, and to the project makes you a fabulous team.  You were dedicated…

City of Toledo
Kerry Bruce, ERP Administrator

We were impressed with Phoenix’s level of expertise, responsiveness, and pricing. When we determined that we needed additional consulting services on the project relating to functional consulting and end-user training, we did not hesitate to call upon Phoenix to provide the services. The Phoenix Team always focused on best business practices and change management during… read more

LEARN MORE ABOUT OUR SERVICES
